sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些副词均可表示"特别地"之意。
means: specially ： 着重为做某事而"专门地、特意地"，相当于on purpose。
especially ： 较多地用于正式文体，侧重超过其它全部，突出到"特别地"的程度，相当于in particular。
particularly ： 用来指同类中特别突出的一个。

sentence.Network_en: Stay in bed extra late or get up specially early.
It can become extremely hot and dry, specially in a small glasshouse.
sentence.Network_cn: 空气会变得特别炎热干燥，特别是在一个小玻璃房里。

sentence.Network_en: Grass shears are specially made to trim grass growing in awkward places.
sentence.Network_cn: 除草剪刀；专门用于修剪缝隙角落里的青草。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 字典中径字的解释 ... (1) 径直;直接[ directly; straightway] (3) 特地,特意[ specially] (4) 通“竟”。即,就[ then].
字典中径字的解释 ... (1) 径直;直接[ directly; straightway] (3) 特地,特意[ specially] (4) 通“竟”。即,就[ then].
《Friends》词汇表B ... multiplex adj. 多元的 specially adv. 特别地, 临时地 motorcycle n. 摩托车, 机车.
九年级英语单词表 ... carry 搬运；携带 specially 特意地；专门地 fetch 拿来；青来.

list.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... special a 特别的；专门的 speciality n 特点；特产 specialize v 专门化，特殊化.
（一）专业（Speciality）：快捷周到的服务+丰富的专业知识+娴熟的业务能力 1、干净整洁的衣着，规范得体的谈吐 2、具备专业房 …
...ing)、大厅(hall)、金属板(plate)、特殊(specials)—范围从温暖的经典弹簧式残响复古音色到TC Electronic纯净但震撼的经典大厅式残 …
专业化（specialization）的问题是它让你成为专家（specialist），切断你与世界上其他任何东西的联系，不仅如此，还切断你与自身 …

entry.def: If something has been done specially for a particular person or purpose, it has been done only for that person or purpose.

example.ex: ...a soap specially designed for those with sensitive skins...
example.tran: 特别为皮肤敏感者设计的香皂

example.ex: Patrick needs to use specially adapted computer equipment...
example.tran: 帕特里克需要使用专门改装过的计算机设备。

entry.def: Specially is used to mean more than usually or more than other things.

example.ex: Stay in bed extra late or get up specially early...
What was specially enjoyable about that job?
example.tran: 那份工作有什么特别有趣之处？

means.word_mean: 2. to a distinctly greater extent or degree than is common;

sentences.sentence: "an especially (or specially) cautious approach to the danger"

auth_sentence.content: Is there anything you specially want me to get?
auth_sentence.res_content: Is there anything you specially want me to get?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Is there anything you specially want me to get?

auth_sentence.content: Your daddy had a specially worrisome week last week.
auth_sentence.res_content: Your daddy had a specially worrisome week last week.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your daddy had a specially worrisome week last week.

auth_sentence.content: Higher salary may be considered for specially qualified candidates.
auth_sentence.res_content: Higher salary may be considered for specially qualified candidates.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Higher salary may be considered for specially qualified candidates.

Sentence.sentence: Most of them are specially made for his shop.

means.word_mean: 特别地; 专门地; 特意

sentences.en: I came here specially to see you.
sentences.cn: 我特地到这里来就是为了看你。
